actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the duration-of-marriage requirements (and other special arrangements) which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is a widow of an insured individual for benefit purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the duration-of-marriage requirements which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is the widow of an individual insured for benefit purposes under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the duration-of-marriage requirements (and other special arrangements) which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is a widow of an insured individual for benefit purposes.
